name: eda-order-processing
description: Sistema de processamento de pedidos usando EDA com Node.js, Fastify, TypeScript e Redis Streams

scripts.install:all: npm run install:shared && npm run install:services
scripts.install:services: cd order-service && npm install && cd ../payment-service && npm install && cd ../inventory-service && npm install && cd ../notification-service && npm install && cd ../audit-service && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "ORDER,PAYMENT,INVENTORY,NOTIFICATION,AUDIT" -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta,cyan" "npm run dev:order" "npm run dev:payment" "npm run dev:inventory" "npm run dev:notification" "npm run dev:audit"
scripts.start: npm run docker:up && npm run dev
